lenders.name: Silas
lenders.loan_because: I've been given a great deal in life, and I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: In Memory of Lori Miller
lenders.loan_because:
I lost my dear wife to cancer at the young age of just 31. She cared so much for those who had fewer opportunities, and always wanted to help out in any way possible--even when she was so sick herself.

I am making my loans in her name, because it is something she would have believed in whole-heartedly---real people, all around the world, reaching out to help each other in their time of need.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I wish you success in your projects.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those trying to help themselves.

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because:
All of us in this world are connected.  We are all one.

Our loans represent Christmas funds we would have spent on adults in our family.   Each family member is therefore contributing to these loans.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a public high school.

lenders.name: Tri
lenders.occupational_info: Manager

lenders.name: Bruce

And it's much more exciting than betting at the track.  Better returns too!
lenders.occupational_info: I transport documents, film, and other things around my city for people and businesses, from office to office or home when they need it urgently.

lenders.loan_because: a small loan can bring one person out of poverty

On one side are the donors who want to change the world by contributing their passion and resources to a school.  On the other side are the students who need an education on their way to change the world.  All parties in this relationship are change agents, and each of us (philanthropist, student and fundraiser) are necessary to make change happen.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info:
"Few will have the greatness to bend history; but each of us can work to change a small portion of events, and in the total of all those acts will be written the history of this generation ... 

It is from numberless diverse acts of courage and belief that human history is thus shaped. Each time a man stands up for an ideal, or acts to improve the lot of others, or strikes out against injustice, he sends forth a tiny ripple of hope, and crossing each other from a million different centers of energy and daring, those ripples build a current which can sweep down the mightiest walls of oppression and resistance." 

 Robert F. Kennedy
June 6, 1966

Complete text :  http://www.rfksafilm.org/html/speeches/unicape.php

lenders.name: Trogo
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in free market capitalism and helping folks achieve their dreams and aspirations.  
My first job out of college was teaching English to children in South Korea.  On my travels I strive to experience first hand and up-close the positive and negative ideals that the United States has spread across this great world.  
I believe that with these loans, I can make a difference in promoting peace, justice, and understanding around the globe.  It would bring me great pleasure to see others across the world prosper as I have.

lenders.name: Gaela
lenders.loan_because: Where someone needs a hand up, it is my honor to provide it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work making maps for a local government agency, but my main priority is going to University of California, Davis in the U.S., where I study Biology.

lenders.name: Ed & "B"
lenders.loan_because: We travel internationally and enjoy giving back to those areas we visit .
lenders.occupational_info: Retired banker and retired high school principal

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I can, so I should.

lenders.name: Cely
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams and goal in life.

lenders.name: Miracle Noodle Team
lenders.occupation: We sell our calorie free Miracle Noodles
lenders.loan_because: A percentage of every sale on our website supports our two favorite charities, the Acumen Fund and kiva.org.
lenders.occupational_info: We believe that empowerment through entrepeneurship is the most powerful form of change possible.  It elevates families and communities at all levels, promotes equality of opportunity, and gives hope through self-determination.

lenders.name: Ramona
lenders.loan_because: I saw this on the Oprah show and it just touched us.   I hope everyone can just see this site.  It's just great!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in customer service,  However, I am a big animal lover and love the rescue sites as well.  Love doing for others.......people or animals, doesn't matter because we are all in it together anyway.    We all need to help any way  we can!

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, as others have helped me start my businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell items online to others and work with others to start a website.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: Its the correct thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I have...why not give? It makes me truly happy to be able to help others in need....it's their gift to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I have three jobs. 1) I work full time for a leading technology institution 2) I teach at another institution and 3) I started my own business Yeah, I'm busy (but driven!)

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I think I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a marketing agency.  I design marketing campaigns.  I work with others to implement them and I measure their impacts.

lenders.name: malcolm
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of microcredit  and it is a great way to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Cary & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: People need other people
lenders.occupational_info: We are in a business that helps other people. Our company is taking the mass money and giving back to the little guy.

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world, even if it is $25 at time.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: People need help and this is an easy way to lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize real estate transactions.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are willing to help themselves. We all can work together to make this world a better place.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Good karma is it's own reward...
lenders.occupational_info: I am an aspiring grant writer and a stay at home mom of two young children.

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be better off than so many other people.  Feels good to give back a little...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a SAP consultant who helps large organizations set up their information systems.  These systems do a lot of things but i work in the areas that record sales, send out bills, account the incoming money and prepare reports about all that is happening.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: we want to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband and I have been married for almost 18 years.  We live in Southern California.  We have 3 children ( Cole 17, Trevor 15, & Jessalyn 14).  

My husband works for a Geothermal Power Plant.   They produce electricity for Southern California.  

I am salesman for a Petroleum Company.   I have been selling petroleum products for the last 2 years.  Prior to that I was an office manager .

lenders.name: Ankur
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell stock, options and futures. The goal is to profit from price change with trades lasting anywhere from several seconds to several weeks.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I love that I can help someone and I  get to see that person and their project,how they live,how they improve, and know that I made a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist, author and photographer. I love to travel.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: By helping others to have a chance to better life for themselves and their families, we all become a little closer.
lenders.occupational_info: I make images of where people live their lives.

lenders.name: Ray and Maureen
lenders.loan_because: God has given us so many material blessings and we just want to share a little with someone who might need a little help.  "...If you have two coats, give one to the poor.  If you have food, share it with those who are hungry,"  Luke 3:11
lenders.occupational_info: Ray works as a division manager in the county Auditor-Controller's Office.  Maureen is a registered nurse working as a shift manager in a critical care unit at a local hospital.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because:
We are all one.
Dr. Bronner  
All hope is with youth!
R.B. Fuller
lenders.occupational_info:
Make no little plans.
D. Burnham

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: I have never seen anything like this and it's an amazing opportunity to help in such a unique way and make a huge impact. The fact that these are loans and not donations allows everyone to help even more entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: I process all types of personnel changes for a large financial company of about 15,000 people. I enjoy what I do, as well as the people I work with. I love reading about the very different types of work that the entrepreneurs on Kiva are involved in.

lenders.name: C.R.
lenders.loan_because: It just feels right
lenders.occupational_info: I provide advice and assistance to the executive management of companies looking to grow their businesses

lenders.name: matt
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity to be a part of a bigger story
lenders.occupational_info: We are the conduit to effectively manage and assure succesful real estate transactions.

lenders.name: Aline & Arielle
lenders.loan_because: my daughter and I like to help.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to give back to those in need.

lenders.name: Nader
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish; feed him for a lifetime"
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Serenity
lenders.loan_because: I need for my life to have a purpose.  What  better way than to provide assistance to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently my work involves finding ways to make my life have purpose.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: Global poverty will affect all of our children's futures.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a lab helping to test new medicines.

lenders.name: Ron & Becky
lenders.loan_because: we wish to "Spread Social Good" around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: Becky is a Professional Photographer at Becky Spencer Photography www.beckyspencer.com and Blogger/Health Coach at A Girlfriends Guide to the Universe, www.agirlfriendsguide.com and Ron is an Insurance Executive and Colonial Group International "where people come first" and the Chief B-Anthropist at The Plan [b] Project, www.spreadsocialgood.org

lenders.name: joshua
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people, who are willing to help themselves.  The vast majority of the borrowers on Kiva are seeking to create value, and not simply looking for a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer in the Information Technology field.  I ensure that my customers have access to network, Internet and E-Mail services.

lenders.name: Jennifer & Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We believe that everyone deserves the chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both professional actors and make our living primarily through the theatre.

lenders.name: Johnston Heights Sec
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are the Johnston Heights Secondary School Kiva Club in a high school in Surrey, BC in Canada. Our goal is to promote social responsibility at Johnston Heights, and to give some insight into the power of strategic philanthropy as provided by the model of micro lending to third world entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers

lenders.name: Santtu
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Fiddling with computers.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in good karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I create the words behind the music.

lenders.name: miquel tort
lenders.loan_because: Considerem que vivim en un món global en què la solidaritat és un valor a promoure.
lenders.occupational_info: Streaming d'actes

lenders.name: Ida Therese
lenders.loan_because: I can. =)

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I've been broke and I've been to 3rd world countries before.  Most importantly I loan because there is nothing more important than embracing your passion and entrepreneurial spirit.  Everyone deserves a chance to make something of their life and follow their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a marine engineer on ocean going vessels.  It is similar to a power plant operator on a vessel.

lenders.name: Stewf
lenders.loan_because: I don't really need any more stuff right now, but there were times when I did, and I was very grateful to benefit from generous lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells digital typefaces to graphic designers, magazines, newspapers, and other corporations and hobbyists. People write to me and ask what font to use. I try to recommend something that will complement their design and turn a few heads. It seems like an esoteric job, but type is really quite accessible — it's everywhere you look, no matter where you live or what you do.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: microfinance is a proven and successful way for people to lift themselves out of poverty in a sustainable way. Being put in touch with people in need of support is the least I can do.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my life and family.  This is such a great opporunity to help.  That my little, means a lot to other folks.
lenders.occupational_info: Work with Computers and Networks.

lenders.name: Craig & Yvonne Dockter
lenders.loan_because: Shoot. On most days, 25 bucks in the right hands can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I market unique and superior nutritional products worldwide. Check it out.

lenders.name: JJ Murphy
lenders.loan_because: I can help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about nature education, sustainable technology, foraging, wilderness survival and  the writing life.

lenders.name: Frode
lenders.loan_because: Promises dont put food on the table

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to also have a chance to fight for a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with health problems to get their work, life and body OK again.

lenders.name: Maria José
lenders.loan_because: I believe that abundance is there for all. Some just need a litle help!

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everybody deserves a chance in life!

lenders.name: Dominique & Alex
lenders.loan_because: I want to show my children what is right.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because:
Each man should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver.
~ 2 Corinthians 9:7
lenders.occupational_info: I am just one of many,.....

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate companies for investment.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Because I can make a difference, and so can you.
lenders.occupational_info: Unlike some people I use work to live, and not the other way around. It's a big world, so go explore it, NOW. Speaking of which: Can you guess where this picture was taken from? (hint: French Alps)

lenders.name: Michael & Carla
lenders.loan_because: To bring justice to God's children

lenders.name: Agence le Prince Noir
lenders.loan_because: Individually we are Kiva lenders and we decided that if our company could afford to pay us a Christmas bonus then it could afford to do something similar for other small businesses

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps. It amazes me that something that impacts my life at such a small scale, can do wonders for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time student in college and I have a part-time job at the school as well.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Many people helped me to create my own business and now I want to give back. I especially enjoy helping others in my own industry
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance hair stylist living in New York City but travel a lot for my clients.

lenders.name: Gillian
lenders.loan_because: my 2 boys raise money by recycling bottles and cans, fundraising and more through their "Michael Recycle and Bro." charity.  I encouraged them to support KIVA. made 11 loans in many different countries all from an initial $50 gift. :D
lenders.occupational_info: we want to ~ be the change we want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me

lenders.name: Deepak Bharathan
lenders.loan_because: It's easy. It works. And it totally rocks!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a management consultant obsessed with creating smart outcomes. Outside cubicles and conference rooms, I am passionate about a diverse portfolio of things which include environment, education, arts and non-profit ventures.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world where a difference needs to be made.  I feel that lending teaches the lendee a much more valuable lesson than does just giving money away.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I'm furthering my education and will be a high school teacher in 2 1/2 years!

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky to be self employed for four years so that I can spend time with my son.  I know how challenging it is to get started and make ends meet and am so happy to help other single moms meet their dreams by having their own business and raising their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find hotels for meetings and conventions.

lenders.name: Deirdre
lenders.loan_because: A good friend JFZ introduced me to the site by getting me going with my first loan amount and I think this is such a wonderful way I can help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer the phones and transfer calls to the appropriate departments. I am also in charge of keeping our accounting system in order. Making payments, collections, etc.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed our family. As a Christian it is very important that I share my blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an advocate for persons living with traumatic brain injuries, autism or mental illness.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower women to become independent

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: People benefit from a "hand up"
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange financing for diverse needs

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: It is good for my soul to help others.  We all came from the same source, why wouldn't we help one another?
lenders.occupational_info: I do not have a permanent job outside the home.  I have two small children that I am raising.  In my spare time, I volunteer and from time to time I work some part-time jobs.

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to improve the world and it is much more efficient than a lot of other organisations.

lenders.name: Mahva
lenders.loan_because: I intend to help as much as I can.  I believe that the abundance in this world is meant for all of us.  Those fortunate enough to see that abundance in their lives right now must remember that just as the Divine has given to us, so we must also give to our brothers and sisters in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a secretary by day, baker by night.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed to be able to live the life that I do. Although I am not well-off by any stretch of the imagination, I have a nice home, all the food I can eat, clean water to drink, a wonderful family, good health, and loving friends. So many others are not as fortunate. I loan because I feel an obligation to "pay it forward."
lenders.occupational_info: I own a boarding and daycare facility for dogs.

lenders.name: Heathers Team
lenders.loan_because: We can - and because of an inspirational person who was part of our lives

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get out od poverty

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help the world become a better place, and you know; what goes around comes around. But I'm NOT donating just so good karma comes back to me. I just want to help the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school, play music, play sports, and have fun!

lenders.name: Caron
lenders.loan_because: I would like to contribute to someone who would benefit from this small gesture
lenders.occupational_info: I practice: Aromatherapy/Massage Therapy and currently a student Teacher Trainer of Hatha Yoga

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference no matter how big or small

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It is one small way to help others that are trying to better their own lives.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to know where my contribution is going.  I do not want to give to an organization that says they "may" use my money for the item I am sponsoring.  I would rather loan it to someone that will use it for something I approve of at the time of my donation.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes blast and bullet resistant glass and armor.  We are in business to save lives.  It makes me proud to work for a company that has such a profound impact.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: I have such a wonderful opportunity to do so in the high hopes it will help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves educating myself so that I may be of value to others in some way, shape, or form.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: This is just a great way to make a difference in the life of someone who really wants to make an honest living but needs some outside help to get started and/or grow.
lenders.occupational_info: Software Engineer, investor, and stay at home Dad.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: Anybody who is willing to work hard to better their situation deserves a chance to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: Restoration

lenders.name: chantel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women be independent and successful.
lenders.occupational_info: teaching is the greatest job in the world and I love being with my students and colleagues.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am very fortunate and wish to assist others in bettering their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help clients plan to pay their state and federal taxes and also complete the tax return paperwork required.

lenders.name: Rondi
lenders.loan_because: I'm doing my part to improve the world one microloan at a time!

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: it is my obligation.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just one woman trying to help other women.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: perhaps in some way, I can make a small difference in someone else's life.  Giving to kiva is not a handout, but an opportunity for a motivated, hardworking individual who wouldn't have gotten it through ordinary means. They are best suited to figure out how to spend it and I wish them every bit of success in their communities!
lenders.occupational_info: My job is the same as every accountant's in the world: I keep track of the cash we earn,  spend and keep. Every month, I tell my bosses how we're performing.

lenders.name: MaryBeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in our global community
lenders.occupational_info: I'm trying to reduce greenhouse gas emissions that lead to climate change

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: helping someone help themselves improves everyone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I record people and mix the audio with music to create commercials that go on radio stations.

lenders.name: Maria-Isabel
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to help people who want to progress.
lenders.occupational_info: For the many years I have been working on developing projects aiming to reduce carbon emissions in the atmosphere (combating climate change).

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: I want to see motivated small businesses succeed, and families and communities prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mental health counselor for children and parents. I try to help children who are suffering from stress, trauma, and abuse, and to help parents nurture their children more effectively.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: $25.00 is a small amount to give to make a life-changing impact for someone who is trying to start their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in the town's public library for 23 years.  Getting the materials that we receive  (books, dvds) ready for check-out is my ( and my co-worker's) main priority.  These materials may be borrowed for free for a period of time.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I write adventure novels for teens.

lenders.name: Gary and Patty
lenders.loan_because: financial independence is a means to happiness, education, social mobility...
lenders.occupational_info: I write screenplays for television shows, TV movies and feature films

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: Its better to Give than to RECEIVE.....

lenders.name: Krista, Joe, Jackson & James
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: seeking gratitude, love, and peace.

lenders.name: Csilla
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if just one person in the world who is economically stable gives a small donation or loan to another individual who is low-income or very poor can reduce suffering in the world.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  We are all in this together and are our brother's keeper.
lenders.occupational_info: my work has allowed me to empower others to see possibilities when they believe there are none.
